name: The Tower (itch) (ArtLeon)
description:
The Circle of Magicians really botched it and accidentally opened up a portal-gate to the demon-realm. Now it is up to you (a Guardian Knight) to climb up the magicians tower, slay the demons that are invading our world and close the portal before it is too late!

Keyboard Controls:

A/D Left and Right

Space- Jump

E-Attack

Escape: Settings and Exit Game

Controller Controls:

Direction Pad - Left/Right

A - Jump

X- Attack

Run, Jump and Fight your way up to the top in this 2D Pixel-Art Platformer!
